channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Miss the iPhone mini? Now's the perfect time for small phones to make a comeback
item.description: Readers told me that they still like small phones, and I think now's the time for compact phones to make a return.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 leaks shed light on colors, prices
item.description: We're still at least a few weeks away from hearing about the next Samsung phones, but some color and pricing info just got out.

item.title: In Davos bubble, AI leaders see no real AI bubble
item.description: At Davos 2026, NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella, and Blackrock CEO Larry Fink wave away AI bubble concerns.

item.title: Not to be outdone by OpenAI, Apple is reportedly developing an AI wearable
item.description: Should this wearable materialize, it could be released as early as 2027, according to a report on the device.
